snippet: A once-powerful corporation has been dropped from the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index, but the fact that it’s down may not mean that it’s out.
abstract: Floyd Norris High & Low Finance column; run up to 1959 strike against US Steel, and eventual terms of settlement, paved the way for company's decline and the industry it led; once-powerful corporation has been dropped from Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index but industry experts say US Steel is still a success story, in relative terms, since company always managed to save itself from bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: A once-powerful corporation has been dropped from the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index, but the fact that it’s down may not mean that it’s out.

headline.print_headline: Titans Today Can Learn From Fall of U.S. Steel
headline.main: Today’s Titans Can Learn From Fall of U.S. Steel
